query: SELECT COLUMN_NAME, DATA_TYPE, COLUMN_TYPE FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'market_reports' AND COLUMN_NAME LIKE 'btc%';
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 27CBZT3mymvjs8P.8b4adb63d759 --database RCAAgyfAbmLvwm7QCEFmbs --execute SELECT COLUMN_NAME, DATA_TYPE, COLUMN_TYPE FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'market_reports' AND COLUMN_NAME LIKE 'btc%';
stdout:
COLUMN_NAME	DATA_TYPE	COLUMN_TYPE
btcState	enum	enum('S1','S2','S3','S4')
btcLiquidityTag	enum	enum('Expanding','Contracting','Unknown')
btcConfidence	enum	enum('watch','confirmed')
btcEvidenceJson	json	json
btc_state	varchar	varchar(10)
btc_liquidity_tag	varchar	varchar(20)
btc_confidence	varchar	varchar(20)
btc_evidence_json	json	json
